content: patriotic hat designed by joy macdonell follow instagram | ravelry | youtube @joymacdonell questions please feel free to ask questions on ravelry or in the comment section of the youtube video description hats for harris is a community-driven knitting initiative aimed at supporting kamala harris and tim walz as they champion social change and equality as we prepare for the upcoming women s march on november 2nd 2024 we invite knitters of all skill levels to join us in creating vibrant handmade hats that symbolize unity empowerment and our commitment to progress whether you knit for yourself or donate a hat for someone attending the march every stitch counts in making a powerful statement let s come together share our passion for knitting and make a difference selecting your pattern this pdf contains two distinct patterns tailored for various wool weights and knitting needle gauges accompanying these patterns is a youtube video that provides a comprehensive step- by-step guide for pattern option 1 pattern option 2 utilizes a lighter wool and a smaller needle size resulting in a denser fabric if you are a beginner knitter and prefer to follow a detailed instructional video it is recommended that you select option 1 copyright joy macdonell not for distribution or duplication 1 patriotic hat option 1 youtube video follows this beginner pattern finished size length
